## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's [RULES/](../RULES/) conventions
- [ ] I've tested this locally with `npm run dev`
- [ ] TypeScript compiles without errors (`npm run build`)

- [ ] AI actions use the whitelist pattern (if touching Clawdbot integration)
